name: unfinished witch project
description:
CONTROLS: wasd to move, mouse to look

this game was meant to be a project for halloween utilising aloelazoe's bitsy 3d.

unfortunately, halfway through the project, all of the dialogue corrupted. i wasn't able to add any text and even going into the gamedata it frequently glitched and deleted itself.

i wanted to release this as is, mostly to be on time for halloween, (nothing spookier than corrupted projects!!!!!)  but also since i didn't want to scrap the project entirely or spend days trying to figure out what's wrong with the code.

i'd also like to thank my friend seth, who helped me by providing some sources for witchcraft practices although the code died before i could work it into the game. thank u :))
